entry.title: eltoo: A Simplified update Mechanism for Lightning and Off-Chain Contracts
entry.summary: ZmnSCPxj reached out to Christian regarding his paper and pointed out a potential mistake in the usage of terms for input script and output script. Christian agreed with the observation and admitted to having flipped the definitions. He promised to make the necessary corrections and release a new version of the paper. Figure 2 in the paper also contains an "output script" that ZmnSCPxj believes could be a `witnessProgram`, `scriptPubKey`, or `redeemScript`.
